mapper.insert: MERGE INTO verification V USING DUAL ON (V.ID = #{id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET V.VERIFICATION_STATUS = 'N' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (V.VERIFICATION_NUM, IDCPICTURE, CMNPICTURE, ID, VERIFICATION_STATUS) VALUES ((select NVL(MAX(VERIFICATION_num), 0) + 1 from VERIFICATION),#{idcpicture}, #{cmnpicture}, #{id},'N')
